titleStmt.title: Theorems evincing, that the subject of the fourth and fifth chapters of the Revelation, is the Church of England, B.L.E. With answers to objections. Humbly offered to the serious consideration of all enemies of the Church of England, dissenters and separatists. By Wal. Garrett, rector of Everly in Wiltshire: sometime fellow of Trinity College in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Garrett, Walter.

titleStmt.title: Theorems evincing, that the subject of the fourth and fifth chapters of the Revelation, is the Church of England, B.L.E. With answers to objections. Humbly offered to the serious consideration of all enemies of the Church of England, dissenters and separatists. By Wal. Garrett, rector of Everly in Wiltshire: sometime fellow of Trinity College in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Garrett, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication conjectured by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in St. David's University College Library, Lampeter, Wales.
